title: CryptoATM
author: CryptoATM
content: Any android app that I can use to stay updated with a particular crypto project? For example Cardano, I want to keep getting every news that have ti do with cardano on my phone how can I make this a possibility?

comments.author: Lantind
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 07, 2022, 06:58:59 AMAny android app that I can use to stay updated with a particular crypto project? For example Cardano, I want to keep getting every news that have ti do with cardano on my phone how can I make this a possibility?So far there is no special application that can access live news about Cardano, but you can take advantage of a supportive exchange, so that the latest news related to Cardano continues to appear, or you can follow their official social media, we usually follow updated news on Twitter, but for there is no special application to my knowledge

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 07, 2022, 06:58:59 AMAny android app that I can use to stay updated with a particular crypto project? For example Cardano, I want to keep getting every news that have ti do with cardano on my phone how can I make this a possibility?It's a bit difficult to know this. It's better if you are using cardano's twitter for that. It will be more accurate rather than using news aggregator. As far i as i know if you will be rarely seeing this. Cardano will be very active to update the latest news on its social media. that will be more accurate rather than using an app. I don't think this kind of app available.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: I believe such app have been exist, but there's no reason I need to install unknown app on my phone. There's many cases crypto holders get hacked after they installed unknown app, clicking random link and open a file from unknown person.Personally I prefer to follow their social media on Twitter, Discord and Telegram to know the news and rumors about the project.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: What's wrong with bookmarking relevant news sites?You can bookmark a site that you choose or regularly visit, like https://messari.io/asset/cardano/news, https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/cardano/news/, or something else. If you really want to have a notification for any news about it, other suggestions besides a specific app for the use case would be; Setting up a notification on their Twitter account, joining their Telegram announcement group, and last, you can subscribe to Reddit /r/cardano RSS.

comments.author: Pterosaur
comments.body: Honestly, google is still the best out there, just type Cardano and click on the news tab you will get all the latest and even past announcements and information about the project, and when it comes to Google it's all about everything, not just Cardano only.

comments.author: masterrex
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 07, 2022, 06:58:59 AMAny android app that I can use to stay updated with a particular crypto project? For example Cardano, I want to keep getting every news that have ti do with cardano on my phone how can I make this a possibility?I think the best way to know more news and info about Cardano and any other cryptocurrencies is through their social media and announcement channels, because they created them for that purpose to disseminate information about the project, But if you want the insights and data of a particular coin or token well there's a lot of them just choose. Coingecko and Coinmarketcap are two of the popular source of daily info about crypto and the market.

comments.author: Tessyb
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 07, 2022, 06:58:59 AMAny android app that I can use to stay updated with a particular crypto project? For example Cardano, I want to keep getting every news that have ti do with cardano on my phone how can I make this a possibility?To get update, you can turn on the notification on your Twitter app and follow the project telegram and Twitter accounts. You can also get updates from CoinMarketCap news. There are other applications that also gives updates when activated on your mobile device.

comments.author: Chainsmokers
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 07, 2022, 06:58:59 AMAny android app that I can use to stay updated with a particular crypto project? For example Cardano, I want to keep getting every news that have ti do with cardano on my phone how can I make this a possibility?there is no app to see in detail a project, but if you want to know a lot of projects you can install Coinmarketcap on your android, and start a search for coins you like, like Cardano, there is a lot of information on coinmarketcap about cardano, from their social media and history price.

comments.author: gurunanakji777
comments.body: I believe it's better to keep an eye on their social media Accounts to always get updated. About such an app, I never heard that gives you updates only about Cardano. You should join their official social media groups like Telegram and Twitter to get the latest updates. Apart from this to get all the updates of my cryptos in one place I create an account on Coingecko and make my portfolio and add my all coins holding and daily I can check instantly all the coins value in just a minute time and it's very good and easy to use.

comments.author: Morningstarr
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 07, 2022, 06:58:59 AMAny android app that I can use to stay updated with a particular crypto project? For example Cardano, I want to keep getting every news that have ti do with cardano on my phone how can I make this a possibility?There is no such app as per my knowledge that gives all the news about a particular project However, there is one way that you can get all the updates and that is to join the project's Twitter, Telegram, and other official media pages and servers, there you will get all kinds of information about the project on time.Apart from this, Investing app is best for important news i.e. crypto, forex, and world news.
